data.title: Fraunces Tavern
data.text:
Named in honor of the ancestors of Revolutionary War Private Isaac Bissell, this room is the largest event space in the building and is dominated by a painted mural of New York in 1717.

* Hosts up to 120 guests

* Complete with its own private bar

* Centrally located on the ground floor

* Fraunces Taverns most versatile event space

* Suitable for presentations

Named in honor of America's first President, and one of our early patrons, this room is luxuriously appointed with a vast and elegant table, crystal chandeliers, and an antique fireplace. This room is perfect for formal dining or conference meetings.

* Hosts up to 24 guests

* Personalized Fine Dining Experience

* Nestled on the second floor

* Intimate and Enchanting Setting

Cozy fireside seating, surrounded by over 500 whiskeys.

Paying homage to the renowned town of Dingle, nestled in County Kerry along Ireland's western shores, The Dingle Whiskey Bar offers the opportunity to savor an exquisitely curated global selection of whiskeys. With an ambiance that seamlessly blends intimacy and exclusivity, this cozy bar was designed so that guests can relax and unwind.

* Hosts up to 25 Guests

* Showcases over 500 Whiskeys

* Features cozy fireside seating

* An ideal setting to entertain guests

Located at the literal heart of Fraunces Tavern, guests are surrounded by an an exquisite collect ion of global premium wine. Here, a unique blend of semi-private charm and lively atmosphere intertwine.

* Hosts up to 25 Guests

* Custom butcher block table and lighting

* Features High Top Seating

* Steps away from our famous Independence Bar

Named after the famous French artistract Marquis de Lafayette who volunteered to join the cause of the American revolution , he commanded major battles that ultimately secured American independence.

* Hosts up to 85 guests

* Full service bar available for private hire

* Gin & Cocktail Focused

* Private Entrances off Water Street

* Up to 9 Draft lines

Beautifully appointed high end cocktail bar, with New York Style Cabaret lounge seating. Showcased in the New York Times, our bar made its debut in 2021 and has since achieved roaring success!

* Hosts up to 75 Guests

* Live music piano bar available for private hire

* Live performers available upon request

* Situated on our second floor
